name: Chord chart into your blog
author: Hiroyuki Baba

sections.description:
• You can insert chord chart into your blog using fumen markdown language (https://hbjpn.github.io/fumen)
  • Usage:
  1. Insert “code” block from visual editor.
  2. Put “!fumen” in the first line
  3. Put fumen markdown code from 2nd line.

* Recommended to use visual editor, rather than classic editor, as special characters like square brackets etc needs to be replaced with character reference which is not convenient.
sections.installation:
1. From the WP admin panel, click “Plugins” -> “Add new”.

OR…

  1. Upload the wp-fumen plugin to your blog, activate it.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

Release Date – 15 June 2023
*Use fumen ver 1.3.1.

1.1.0

Release Date – 11 Feb 2021
*Use fumen ver 1.3.0.

1.0.0

Release Date – 20 Oct 2020
*Initial version created. fumen ver 1.2.1 is used.

short_description: Insert chord and rhythm chart into your blog using markup codes.
